channel.title: Comments on: Chrome: Intentionally Blank Tab

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/04/14/chrome-intentionally-blank-tab/#comment-4337">Michal Zuber</a>.
I'm not submitting it to the Chrome Web Store, so I haven't worried about distributing a packed version.
To use it as is you'll need to checkout a copy of the source code from Github, then check "Developer Mode" at chrome://extensions/. You'll then have an option to "Load unpacked extension".
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Michal Zuber.

I’m not submitting it to the Chrome Web Store, so I haven’t worried about distributing a packed version.

To use it as is you’ll need to checkout a copy of the source code from Github, then check “Developer Mode” at chrome://extensions/. You’ll then have an option to “Load unpacked extension”.

item.title: By: Michal Zuber
item.dc:creator: Michal Zuber
item.description: Hello Joseph, nice one, but how to install it? Chrome extension should be packed in file .crx as I know :P
item.content:encoded: Hello Joseph, nice one, but how to install it? Chrome extension should be packed in file .crx as I know ðŸ˜›
